TopicTitle: Finding the Connection address for a KMP server

Articles.Content: So earlier I made my server work by running it on administrator but now I can't for the life of me find the address to connect to that server. I am using the same machine to play and run the server. Can anybody help me.

if you are connecting to your own machine and everything is on default it will be localhost or 127.0.0.1 and the port is 2076

to get your external ip so others can connect go to http://www.ipchicken.com/, you may need to forward some ports in your router/firewall etc
